contentrichtext.text: '''Apollonia''' may be: ==People== *[[Apollonia Kotero]], musician & actress *[[Saint Apollonia]], of Alexandria ==Places== ;Albania: * [[Apollonia, Illyria]] ;Bulgaria: * [[Apollonia, Thrace]] now [[Sozopol]] ;France: * [[Mayenne (river)|Sainte-Apollonie island]], Île de Sainte-Apollonie, on the Mayenne river in the French region Pays de la Loire ;Greece: *[[Apollonia (Acte)]], a city on [[Mount Athos]] *[[Apollonia (Aetolia)]], a town near to [[Naupactus]] *[[Apollonia (Chalcidice)]], a city in the [[Chalcidice]] *[[Apollonia (Kavala)]], a city in [[Kavala]], northern Greece *[[Apollonia (Mygdonia)]], an inland city near modern Apollonia, Thessaloniki, allegedly visited by the apostle Paul *[[Apollonia, Sifnos]], the main town on the island of [[Sifnos]] *[[Apollonia, Thessaloniki]] *Three cities in [[Crete]]: **[[Apollonia (North coast of Crete)]], on the north coast **[[Apollonia (South coast of Crete)]], on the south coast **[[Eleutherna]], inland city also called Apollonia ;Israel: * [[Arsuf]], Hellenistic Apollonia, near modern Herzliya ;Indonesia: * [[Fort Apollonia]], Dutch settlement, now called [[Surabaya]] ;Italy: * [[Apollonia (Sicily)]], a sea port town in Northern Sicily, identified with Pollina * [[Sant'Apollonia (Padua)]], township situated in Bagnoli di Sopra Padua, Veneto * [[Fondamenta Sant'Apollonia]], situated in Venice, Veneto * [[Sant'Apollonia (Turin)]], township located in Val della Torre, province Turin, in the Piedmont region * [[Sant'Apollonia (Brescia)]], township in Ponte di Legno, province of Brescia * [[Sant'Apollonia (Lecco)]], township located in Viganò, locality of Lecco * [[Sant'Apollonia (Ancona)]], situated in Corinaldo, province of Ancona ;Libya: * [[Apollonia, Cyrenaica]] ;Turkey: * [[Apollonia (Lycia)]], an ancient city in [[Lycia]] * [[Apollonia (Mysia)]], an ancient city in [[Mysia]] * [[Sozopolis, Pisidia|Apollonia (Pisidia)]] (later called Sozopolis) an ancient city in [[Pisidia]]. * [[Apollonia ad Rhyndacum]], a town astride the river Rhyndacus in Bithynia next to the lake Apolloniatis * [[Assos]], also called Apollonia ;United States * [[Apollonia, Wisconsin]] ;Interplanetary: *[[358 Apollonia]] is a large Main belt asteroid *[[Apollonia (Mercury)]] is an [[List of albedo features on Mercury|albedo feature on Mercury]]. ==Other== ;Education *[[Apollonia University]], a private university in [[Iași]], Romania ;Fictional characters *[[Apollonia Vitelli-Corleone]] was a fictional character in [[Mario Puzo]]'s ''The Godfather'' saga ;Group(s) *[[Apollonia 6]], a musical group led by Apollonia Kotero ==See also== *[[Apolloniatis (disambiguation)]] *''[[Apollonias]]'', a genus of plants in the family Lauraceae {{disambig}}
